welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Groton, a charming coastal town known for its rich history and beautiful scenery. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: Hanscom Field's main terminal offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is where all commercial flights arrive and depart.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester-Boston Regional Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lawrence Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Municipal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo flights and shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
